text: Aur hum ney madiyan walon ki taraf unn kay bhai shoaib ko bhej a uss ney kaha aey meri qom! Allah ki ibadat kero aur uss kay siwa tumhara koi mabood nahi aur tum naap tol mein bhi kami na kero mein to tumhen aasooda haal dekh raha hun aur mujhay tum per gherney walay din kay azab ka khof (bhi) hai
